note: This is the probability of a child born in a specific year or period dying before reaching the age of one, if subject to age-specific mortality rates of that period. This is given as the share of live births. Projections from 2024 onwards are based on the UN's medium scenario.
subtitle: The share of children who die before reaching the age of one. Projections from 2024 onwards are based on the UN's medium scenario.
